ComicInfo.Penciller: Nick Cardy,Jerry Grandenetti,Nick Cardy,George Tuska,Lee Elias
ComicInfo.Title: A Tomb for the Living!; The Four Threads of Doom; Stop Beating, Heart! You're Killing Me!; The Lamp That Changed People!; What Evil Haunts This House?
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Tomb for the Living!: A burglar ends up trapped for life under Cyrus Randolph's mansion.
The Four Threads of Doom: Four convicts on their way to death row escape but are re-captured by the three Fates of ancient Greek myth.
Stop Beating, Heart! You're Killing Me!: Standish has a cursed heart used in his transplant.
The Lamp That Changed People!: Jennie discovers that the junk lamp that her husband brought home is really a magic lamp that can make her the richest woman in the world.
What Evil Haunts This House?: Mr. Craven is driving his daughter Elsie crazy.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
